issue.title: [Python] Remove gcc 4.9 compatibility code
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18270](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18270). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Since we now require a C++17-compliant compiler, we don't support gcc 4.9 anymore. The following code can probably be simplified:
https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/619b034bd3e14937fa5d12f8e86fa83e7444b886/python/pyarrow/src/arrow/python/datetime.cc#L41

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18270?focusedCommentId=17631698) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14602
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14602>
